Articles.Content:
Hi There,

A question for Squad :

When will we have a new planet to crash on ?

The Kerbin system is pretty good, but it really misses its second gas giant. With rings !!

Saturn anyone ?

Any Kerbonauts willing to get stranded near Katurn's rings ?

(sorry if it was already asked 10025815 times ... )
Well, we probably won't be "crashing" per se; according to the Wiki, the next planet to be added is another gas giant.
Yeah. I too hope that SQUAD will one day think of their long-time players Kerbol system as it is is still fun, but i miss the thrill of novelty i've last time experienced landing on Eeloo.
Yes, this is a feature we've been waiting for for - God, it's been 2 and a 1/2 years since the other planets were added. #geezer.

Since new planets are on the list of things not to suggest, I'll close this thread.

The last official word I know of is from Maxmaps's AMA:

More planets are a big maybe right now. We have to finish making the current ones as good as Kerbin.
